Elemental Weapons.name: Elemental Weapons
descriptions: Increases the effectiveness of your elemental weapon enchants by 10%.
Increases the effectiveness of your elemental weapon enchants by 20%.
Increases the effectiveness of your elemental weapon enchants by 30%.

Ancestral Knowledge.name: Ancestral Knowledge
descriptions: Increases your maximum Mana by 2%.
Increases your maximum Mana by 4%.
Increases your maximum Mana by 6%.
Increases your maximum Mana by 8%.
Increases your maximum Mana by 10%.

Shield Specialization.name: Shield Specialization
descriptions: Increases your chance to block attacks with a shield by 3% and has a 50% chance to restore 1% of your Mana when a block occurs.
Increases your chance to block attacks with a shield by 5% and has a 100% chance to restore 1% of your Mana when a block occurs.

Guardian Totems.name: Guardian Totems
descriptions: Increases the effect of your Resistance Totems, Stoneskin Totem and Windwall Totem by 25% and reduces the cooldown of your Grounding Totem by 10 sec.
Increases the effect of your Resistance Totems, Stoneskin Totem and Windwall Totem by 50% and reduces the cooldown of your Grounding Totem by 20 sec.

Thundering Strikes.name: Thundering Strikes
descriptions: Improves your chance to get a critical strike with your weapon attacks and Shock spells by 1%.
Improves your chance to get a critical strike with your weapon attacks and Shock spells by 2%.
Improves your chance to get a critical strike with your weapon attacks and Shock spells by 3%.
Improves your chance to get a critical strike with your weapon attacks and Shock spells by 4%.
Improves your chance to get a critical strike with your weapon attacks and Shock spells by 5%.

Anticipation.name: Anticipation
descriptions: Reduces the chance your Shock spells are resisted and the chance you are hit by spells and ranged attacks by 3%.
Reduces the chance your Shock spells are resisted and the chance you are hit by spells and ranged attacks by 6%.
Reduces the chance your Shock spells are resisted and the chance you are hit by spells and ranged attacks by 9%.

Rockhide.name: Rockhide
descriptions: When struck in combat has a 1% chance to inflict up to 120 physical damage (scales with your level) to nearby enemies and to stun them for 1 seconds.  In addition, reduces all damage taken by 1%.
When struck in combat has a 2% chance to inflict up to 120 physical damage (scales with your level) to nearby enemies and to stun them for 1 seconds.  In addition, reduces all damage taken by 2%.
When struck in combat has a 3% chance to inflict up to 120 physical damage (scales with your level) to nearby enemies and to stun them for 1 seconds.  In addition, reduces all damage taken by 3%.
When struck in combat has a 4% chance to inflict up to 120 physical damage (scales with your level) to nearby enemies and to stun them for 1 seconds.  In addition, reduces all damage taken by 4%.
When struck in combat has a 5% chance to inflict up to 120 physical damage (scales with your level) to nearby enemies and to stun them for 1 seconds.  In addition, reduces all damage taken by 5%.

Flurry.name: Flurry
descriptions: Increases your attack speed by 10% for your next 3 swings after dealing a critical strike.
Increases your attack speed by 15% for your next 3 swings after dealing a critical strike.
Increases your attack speed by 20% for your next 3 swings after dealing a critical strike.
Increases your attack speed by 25% for your next 3 swings after dealing a critical strike.
Increases your attack speed by 30% for your next 3 swings after dealing a critical strike.

Earth Shield.name: Earth Shield
descriptions: Increases Healing done and taken by 10% and chance to block by 30%. Lasts for 10 minutes or 20 attacks.

Weapon Mastery.name: Weapon Mastery
descriptions: Increases the damage you deal with all weapons by 2%.
Increases the damage you deal with all weapons by 4%.
Increases the damage you deal with all weapons by 6%.
Increases the damage you deal with all weapons by 8%.
Increases the damage you deal with all weapons by 10%.

Enhancing Totems.name: Enhancing Totems
descriptions: Increases the effect and reduces the Mana cost of your Strength of Earth and Grace of Air Totems by 25%.
Increases the effect and reduces the Mana cost of your Strength of Earth and Grace of Air Totems by 50%.

Toughness.name: Toughness
descriptions: Increases your resistance and armor value from items by 5%.
Increases your resistance and armor value from items by 10%.
Increases your resistance and armor value from items by 15%.

Improved Ghost Wolf.name: Improved Ghost Wolf
descriptions: Reduces Mana cost and cast time of your Ghost Wolf spell by 50% sec.
Reduces Mana cost and cast time of your Ghost Wolf spell by 100% sec.

Improved Lightning Shield.name: Improved Lightning Shield
descriptions: Increases the damage done by your Lightning Shield orbs by 5%, reduces it's Mana cost by 5% and increases number of orbs by 3.
Increases the damage done by your Lightning Shield orbs by 10%, reduces it's Mana cost by 10% and increases number of orbs by 5.
Increases the damage done by your Lightning Shield orbs by 15%, reduces it's Mana cost by 15% and increases number of orbs by 7.

Improved Weapon Totems.name: Improved Weapon Totems
descriptions: Increases the effect and reduces the Mana cost of your Windfury and Flametongue totems by 25%.
Increases the effect and reduces the Mana cost of your Windfury and Flametongue totems by 50%.

Bloodlust.name: Bloodlust
descriptions: Increases an ally's attack and casting speed by 10% for 3 minutes.

Primal Endurance.name: Primal Endurance
descriptions: Increases total health by 4%.
Increases total health by 8%.
Increases total health by 12%.
Increases total health by 16%.
Increases total health by 20%.

Armaments of Storm.name: Armaments of Storm
descriptions: Imbue weapons with storm, gives you a 4% chance to deal additional up to 300 Nature damage.(Scales with your level)
Imbue weapons with storm, gives you a 8% chance to deal additional up to 300 Nature damage.(Scales with your level)
Imbue weapons with storm, gives you a 12% chance to deal additional up to 300 Nature damage.(Scales with your level)
Imbue weapons with storm, gives you a 16% chance to deal additional up to 300 Nature damage.(Scales with your level)
Imbue weapons with storm, gives you a 20% chance to deal additional up to 300 Nature damage.(Scales with your level)

Shamanism.name: Shamanism
descriptions: Gives your Main Hand attacks a chance to enter a Shamanic Trance. The Shamanic Trance reduces the cast time and Mana cost of your next damage spell by 100% and greatly reduces target's chance to resist that spell.

Gives your Main Hand attacks a chance to enter a Shamanic Trance. The Shamanic Trance reduces the cast time and Mana cost of your next damage spell by 100% and greatly reduces target's chance to resist that spell. Effect occurs more often than Shamanism (Rank 1).

Gives your Main Hand attacks a chance to enter a Shamanic Trance. The Shamanic Trance reduces the cast time and Mana cost of your next damage spell by 100% and greatly reduces target's chance to resist that spell. Effect occurs more often than Shamanism (Rank 2).

Gives your Main Hand attacks a chance to enter a Shamanic Trance. The Shamanic Trance reduces the cast time and Mana cost of your next damage spell by 100% and greatly reduces target's chance to resist that spell. Effect occurs more often than Shamanism (Rank 3).

Gives your Main Hand attacks a chance to enter a Shamanic Trance. The Shamanic Trance reduces the cast time and Mana cost of your next damage spell by 100% and greatly reduces target's chance to resist that spell. Effect occurs more often than Shamanism (Rank 4).

Aftershock.name: Aftershock
descriptions:
Blasts a target with aftershock, consuming your shock spells and applies an effects based on consumed shock spells. 

Flame Shock: instantly deals damage equal to 15 sec of Flame Shock.

Frost Shock: stuns the target for 3 seconds. 

Earth Shock: breaks movement impairing effects for you and forces the target to focus attacks on you for 5 seconds.
